sentences.en: a twofold increase in cases of TB
But twice the pressure does not increase the storage twofold.
sentences.cn: 不过,两倍的压缩量并不等于两倍的存量.

sentences.en: It possesses twofold attributions : personality right and property right . 3.
sentences.cn: 体育冠名权同时具有人格权和财产权的双重属性.

sentences.en: Jesus'resurrection is refracted into the experience in a twofold fashion.
sentences.cn: 耶稣的复活在信徒经历里的反映,分两个层面.

sentences.en: The case against is twofold: too risky and too expensive.
sentences.cn: 反对理由有两点：太冒险而且太昂贵。

sentences.en: The case for doing more is twofold.
sentences.cn: 广告采取更多措施有一石两鸟的作用.

sentences.en: The city's population density has grown twofold over the last ten years.
sentences.cn: 城市的人口密度已经在过去十年增加了两倍.

sentences.en: The office of a clergyman is twofold; public preaching and private influence.
sentences.cn: 牧师的职责是双重的: 公众讲道和个人感化.

sentences.en: The price of TVs are twofold down over these years.
sentences.cn: 近几年来,电视机的价格下降了两倍.

sentences.en: The radiative effect of increased cloud is twofold.
sentences.cn: 云的增加对辐射有两方面的影响.

sentences.en: The reasons for forming the French Foreign Legion were probably twofold.
sentences.cn: 组建法国外籍军团的理由或许是双重的.

sentences.en: The reasons for this are twofold; they are technical as well as moral.
sentences.cn: 其中的原因有二, 它们既是技术上的,又是道德上的.

sentences.en: The value of the new Cordinate Systems and surfaces is twofold.
sentences.cn: 新坐标系和坐标曲面的价值是双重的.

sentences.en: Their targets were twofold: inflation and unemployment.
sentences.cn: 他们的目标是双重的: 通货膨胀与失业.

trans.tran_cn: <书>由两部分组成的，有两部分的，两倍的
trans.tran_en: two times as much or as many of something
